articles.description: Arsenal's support of Stonewall's Rainbow Laces campaign saw them welcome Jahmal Howlett-Mundle to the Emirates Stadium for the Premier League game against Nottingham Forest
articles.content:
Arsenal welcomed Jahmal Howlett-Mundle to the Emirates Stadium as a special guest for Sunday's clash with Nottingham Forest to mark the Premier League's support of the Rainbow Laces campaign.

articles.title: Scotland 15-16 Australia: Blair Kinghorn unfairly haunted by ghost of Finn Russell - BBC
articles.description: Everything Blair Kinghorn does while playing at 10 for Scotland will unjustly be seen through a Finn Russell prism, writes Tom English.
articles.content:
Blair Kinghorn scored a try but missed a last-gasp penalty to earn Scotland victory
